title: ‘Escape from New York’ Remake is Still Alive; Has Found New Writer
text:
‘Escape from New York’ Remake is Still Alive; Has Found New Writer 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
For over eight years now an Escape from New York remake has been in development. Originally, Gerard Butler (300) was set to star, which, ...
